name: Imp
damageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not silvered

specialTraits.name: Shapechanger
specialTraits.description: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat, a raven, or a spider, or back into its true form.

specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight
specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
specialTraits.description: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The imp magically turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

name: Balor
goals: defeat powerful foes to prove its might
damageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.name: Death Throes
specialTraits.description: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

savingThrow.effect: 70 (20d6) fire damage, or half on success

specialTraits.name: Fire Aura
specialTraits.description: At the start of each of the balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage.

specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
specialTraits.description: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

specialTraits.name: Magic Weapons
specialTraits.description: The balor's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The balor makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its whip.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) lightning damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

actions.name: Whip
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.

triggeredEffects.description: The whip's heat lashes out even on a miss.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendaryActions.name: Teleport
legendaryActions.description: The balor uses its Teleport action.

legendaryActions.name: Whip Attack
legendaryActions.description: The balor makes one whip attack.
